Destructor ran up. "Yes proto must have energon. Sir I can patch into his 
memory, he doesnt have a port of any type but he told me how to if he was ever 
disabled." He placed his hand inside proto silver form and his datatracks were 
found. "I go them sir...relplaying message and images proto recieved."
"RODIMUS IT IS 
 AS I FEARED. PRIME WALKS AGAIN BUT NOT AS HE ONCE WAS! THEY HAVE USED MY HALF 
 SPARK AND BLACKENED IT AND ADDED IT TO PRIME. HE IS NOW A PREDACON NO A 
 TRIPREDACON! HE CAN TRANSFORM INTO DARK GOD PRIME WHEN HE WISHES TOO! HES 
 COMING FOR ME HES DESTROYED ALL LIFE ON THE PLANET! EVEN THE TRIPED GENERAL 
 WHO CONQUERED CYBERTRON! RODIMUS HES COMING FOR ME AND HES FOUND A WAY BACK 
TO 
 EARTH...ILL TRY TO GET OUT BUT I DONT KNOW IF I...RODIMUS HES HERE RODIMUS 
 HELP ME! HEL".......END OF MESSAGE
Images of Prime then Ultra Magnus then Primes new form would be shown infront 
of Hydras.
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> Rodimus was watching Wheeljack on the monitor, when Magnus' comm message came 
> over.
> He suddenly collapsed.
> Rodimus Prime: It cant be... how could they?... We're all going to die soon... I 
> can't beat... HIM!
>  aerosmith4e@... wrote:Rodimus would recieve this message as a priotirty 
> one signal. "RODIMUS IT IS 
> AS I FEARED. PRIME WALKS AGAIN BUT NOT AS HE ONCE WAS! THEY HAVE USED MY HALF 
> SPARK AND BLACKENED IT AND ADDED IT TO PRIME. HE IS NOW A PREDACON NO A 
> TRIPREDACON! HE CAN TRANSFORM INTO DARK GOD PRIME WHEN HE WISHES TOO! HES 
> COMING FOR ME HES DESTROYED ALL LIFE ON THE PLANET! EVEN THE TRIPED GENERAL 
> WHO CONQUERED CYBERTRON! RODIMUS HES COMING FOR ME AND HES FOUND A WAY BACK TO 
> EARTH...ILL TRY TO GET OUT BUT I DONT KNOW IF I...RODIMUS HES HERE RODIMUS 
> HELP ME! HEL".......END OF MESSAGE
> 
> HES COMING! THE CLOCK STARTS NOW:7 DAYS TILL HE RETURNS
> > Alex started to get up when the maximals shields suddly shot up gest 
> > missing them "this don't look good" rapid said taking a step back and 
> > keeping his hands close to his blaster gest incase 
> > 
> > suddly Alex's wrist started to shake and make strange sounds before a 
> > 3d holo pic of DNA appeared above them with a lines and lines of 
> > writing scrolling down and stopped on the word Plague and zoomed in 
> > on it and marked it in a crimson red color with skulls on the 
> > side "ummmm rapid i don't think its us there putting the shield up 
> > for" he said a little worried "if i'm reading this right and i sure 
> > hope i'm not that cloud of red thats coming from over there" he said 
> > pointing away from the ship "has traces of rust" alex said 
> > 
> > "ohhhh whats the matter Alex afraid of getting your cloths a little 
> > dirty" rapid said in a sappy annoying voice as he put his hands on 
> > the sides of his face 
> > 
> > "no i'm not the one who sould be worrying since that "scaring rust" 
> > has trances of the Plague" Alex said looking at rapid whos expression 
> > changed quickly from laughing to died scared "thats not possible were 
> > on earth the plague won't even come for 2000 years or so" rapid said 
> > taking a few steps back almost walking into the shield "well i can't 
> > explain why its here no more then u, but i say we get the slag out of 
> > here before it arrives" alex said looking at how scared rapid was "OR 
> > THE RUST MONSTER WILL GET U" said in a loud scaring voice trying to 
> > scare rapid
> > 
> > "or we can try the..." slex started before rapid cut him off 
> > "ohhh no u don't i'm not trying one of those inventions of your" he 
> > said backing away from alex holding his hands out "i'll take my 
> > chances with the cloud before I test another one of your inventions" 
> > he said transforming but before he could  drive away Alex had a odd 
> > gun out from the trailer and locked on Rapid "now say plastic" he 
> > said firing a clear liquid orb at rapid covering him in a odd sticky 
> > liquid that quickly started to harden around him
> > 
> > "now see that didn't hurt now did it" alex said with a smile resting 
> > the gun on his shoulder "easy for you to say" rapid said as a pic 
> > appeared of his head on his wrist computer "you can move" rapid said 
> > giving him the evil eye
> > "oh be quite its air tigh so not even a atom can get in" Alex said 
> > putting away the gun "now we wait for the maxiamals to rember we 
> > exite" alex said sitting on rapid like he was a sofa and put his feet 
> > on the front
